TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerActionPropertyItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerActionPropertyItem Inherits DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 代表與從 衍生之類別中屬性相關聯的面板項目。

span.span: Represents a panel item that is associated with a property in a class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表智慧標籤面板中的個別項目。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 每個項目是通常從衍生類別中的屬性與相關聯類別和元件作者所提供。Each item is typically associated with a property in a class that is derived from the class and supplied by the component author. 是透過屬性的名稱會保持的關聯性中所儲存屬性。The association is maintained through the name of the property, as stored in the property. 個別的控制台項目相關聯一起以形成面板呼叫方法類別。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. 若要顯示相關聯屬性的值，該屬性必須有`get`存取子方法; 允許編輯，此屬性必須擁有`set`存取子方法。To display the value of the associated property, that property must have a `get` accessor method; to allow editing, the property must have a `set` accessor method. 在其中面板可讓您直接編輯使用者的屬性項目方式則取決於有相關聯屬性的資料類型支援的型別資訊。The way in which the panel allows direct editing of a property item by the user depends on the supporting type information present for the data type of the associated property. 下表顯示可能的配置。The following table shows the likely scheme. |屬性類型資訊Property type information|編輯使用者介面 (UI) 的屬性項目Property item editing user interface (UI)| |-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------| |具有相關聯的類型編輯器 ()Has an associated type editor ()|基礎屬性相關聯的型別編輯器會顯示編輯屬性的值。The type editor associated with the underlying property is displayed for editing the property's value.| |有已知的型別相關聯的類型轉換子 ()Has an associated type converter to a known type ()|已知類型的型別編輯器會顯示編輯屬性的值。The type editor for the known type is displayed for editing the property's value. 例如，類型轉換器，將可能顯示。For example, a type converter to will likely display a .| |布林值Boolean value|項目會顯示使用二進位的 UI，例如核取記號。The item is displayed using a binary UI, such as a check mark.| |以上皆非。None of the above.|項目會顯示為使用資料類型的非可編輯的文字字串方法。The item is displayed as a non-editable text string using the data type's method.| 所有的基本類型，例如，且常見[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]資料類型，例如，提供標準的類型轉換器和編輯器。All fundamental types, such as , and common [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] data types, such as , supply standard type converters and editors. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)或[一般化類型轉換](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)。For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada). 如需型別編輯器的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作 UI 類型編輯器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed961fb9-ee02-4666-b511-05f3204bb75c)。For more information about type editors, see [How to: Implement a UI Type Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed961fb9-ee02-4666-b511-05f3204bb75c). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱[How to： 將附加到 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式和屬性`null`。The constructor sets the and properties to `null`. `memberName`參數是衍生自程式設計人員提供的類別成員相關聯屬性的名稱是指類別。The `memberName` parameter refers to the name of the associated property that is a member of the programmer-supplied class derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式屬性`null`。The constructor sets the property to `null`. 如需有關如何`category`參數用來在面板上的項目分組，請參閱方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. `memberName`參數是衍生自程式設計人員提供的類別成員相關聯屬性的名稱是指。The `memberName` parameter refers to the name of the associated property that is a member of the programmer-supplied class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何`category`參數用來在面板上的項目分組，請參閱方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. `memberName`參數是衍生自程式設計人員提供的類別成員相關聯屬性的名稱是指類別。The `memberName` parameter refers to the name of the associated property that is a member of the programmer-supplied class derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱[How to： 將附加到 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). summary.span: 取得與這個項目相關聯之屬性的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that this item is associated with.
A that contains the name of the associated property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定哪一個屬性 — 從衍生類別中類別 — 應該繫結項目。The property specifies which property—in the class derived from the class—the item should be bound to. 當程式設計人員與透過使用者介面 (UI) 的控制台項目互動時，會設定此相關聯的屬性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 設定於建構函式。 is set in the constructor. 其值會區分大小寫。Its value is case-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ComponentModel.IComponent RelatedComponent { get; set; }
.property instance class System.ComponentModel.IComponent RelatedComponent
Public Property RelatedComponent As IComponent
public: property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ RelatedComponent { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定元件，該元件將其項目提供給目前的面板。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its items to the current panel.

value.span: 提供項目的元件，該元件應當具有提供 物件的相關聯設計工具。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與屬性，另一個元件可以增加到目前的清單及其提取模型控制台項目。With the property, another component can lend its pull-model panel items to the current list. 例如，使用者控制項可能會彙總物件從一個或多個構成的控制項。For example, a user control might aggregate the objects from one or more of its constituent controls. 這個屬性可搭配屬性。This property works in conjunction with the property.
